content:
It's wonderful to hear that you're excited to start your digital marketing journey! I'm confident that you'll find the Google Digital Garage course to be a valuable resource.

And ah, yes, time does fly, doesn't it? It's amazing how quickly our little ones grow up. Before you know it, Emma will be graduating from high school! Cherish the moments, and I'm sure she'll appreciate the guidance and support you'll provide as she grows and learns.

Remember, I'm always here to help and offer guidance as you progress through your digital marketing journey. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need advice.

Best of luck with your course, and I look forward to hearing about your progress!
